Dialogue.Page: DANGER! Inside this fence is a pocket of <color=orange>ghost matter</color> - a strange and dangerous substance that’s invisible to the naked eyes. The good news is that you can detect <color=orange>ghost matter</color> with a camera.
Moving through <color=orange>ghost matter</color> is uniquely painful and will probably kill you. Don’t complain to me if you hurt yourself fooling around.\\n- Hornfels
